name: Innocent Life: A Futuristic Harvest Moon Special Edition
summary: The game takes place on the relic-filled Heartflame Island which can be explored by walking or riding on a buggy. Players have the ability to explore the island's ruins and even visit a volcano. All these areas have their own terrain and is said to resemble a tropical paradise but in order to explore all over the island the player must collect jewels and break the seal.
